attributes.action: urgently consider introducing 20 mph speed limits in all UK urban areas, in light of the research published recently by the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine into the safety benefits of such zones in London, which showed a 40 per cent reduction in road injuries and a 50 per cent cut in road deaths.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reports regarding the London School of Tropical Medicine and Hygiene research can be viewed by following these links:

http://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2009/12/091210193202.htm

http://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2009/12/091210193202.htm
